scripts.test:capture: node scripts/network-capture.js --test-command "cd admin-web && npm run ui:test"
scripts.allure:merge: powershell -Command "if (!(Test-Path all-results)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory all-results | Out-Null }; if (Test-Path auth-backend/target/allure-results) { Copy-Item auth-backend/target/allure-results/* all-results/ -Recurse -Force }; if (Test-Path admin-web/allure-results) { Copy-Item admin-web/allure-results/* all-results/ -Recurse -Force }"
scripts.report:both: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run allure:clean && npm run allure:merge && npm run allure:report && npm run allure:open
